Package de.db.derpate.manager

Class ImageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.db.derpate.manager.ImageManager
  • public class ImageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The ImageManager is able to read and write godfather images from the default data source.
    Pattern: SINGLETON
    Author:
    MichelBlank
    See Also:
    GodfatherImageServlet, GodfatherUpdateImageServlet

        Writes a godfather image to the filesystem
        Parameters:
